text:
Today we're learning how to be polite at
a dinner party with this hilarious scene
from Shrek 2.

What's up everyone today you'll be
learning some useful vocabulary and

expressions with a range of
English accents,
including Scottish and Americans.

In case you're new here,
I want to let you know that we

are here to help you learn fast English,
without getting lost, without missing the

jokes and without subtitles.
Just like this fan, who says that our

channel is the cream of the crop.
So don't forget to hit that Subscribe

button and the Bell down below
so that you don't miss a single one of
our new lessons.

Do you find it difficult to understand
fast speaking natives?

Then I highly recommend our Fluent
with Friends course.

In this 48-week course you will learn
with the first two seasons of Friends.

You'll receive pdf power lessons every
week,

vocabulary memorization software, access
to our Fluency Circle Global Community,

and so much more!
And did you know you can

try it right now for FREE with our
3-Part Masterclass?

All you have to do is click up
here or down in the description below to

learn more and sign up now.
We hope to see you there!

If you're enjoying this lesson, then I highly
recommend that you check out our

lesson with the Disney Pixar
classic Up next.

You can click up here or down in the
description box below to watch that
straight after this lesson.
